targets.rawSql: SELECT tr.ts AS time, p.external_id AS metric, tr.value FROM timeseries_readings tr JOIN points p ON tr.point_id = p.id WHERE $__timeFilter(tr.ts) AND p.site_id::text = '$site' AND p.bacnet_device_id = '$device' ORDER BY tr.ts ASC

SELECT tr.ts AS time, tr.value FROM timeseries_readings tr JOIN points p ON tr.point_id = p.id WHERE $__timeFilter(tr.ts) AND p.site_id::text = '$site' AND p.bacnet_device_id = '$device' AND p.external_id = '$point' ORDER BY tr.ts ASC

list.name: site
list.query: SELECT name AS __text, id::text AS __value FROM sites ORDER BY name

list.name: device
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT bacnet_device_id AS __text, bacnet_device_id AS __value FROM points WHERE site_id::text = '$site' AND bacnet_device_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY bacnet_device_id

list.name: point
list.query: SELECT external_id AS __text, external_id AS __value FROM points WHERE site_id::text = '$site' AND bacnet_device_id = '$device' ORDER BY external_id
